first_para: Craig Mackinlay JP (born 1967) is a British businessman and politician.

full.extract:
Craig Mackinlay JP (born 1967) is a British businessman and politician.
He was initially a member of the UK Independence Party (UKIP), standing for election several times and served as deputy leader of UKIP in 1997. In 2005 he joined the Conservative Party. Mackinley stood as the Conservative candidate in Kent at the inaugural police and crime commissioner elections in 2012.
In July 2014 he was selected as the Conservative candidate for South Thanet at the 2015 general election.
full.title: Craig Mackinlay
